author: Staff Reporter
text:
A 32-year-old woman has alleged that a deputy tahsildar had sexually harassed her.

In her complaint to the Deputy Inspector General of Police, Salem Range, P. Nagarajan, Krishnaveni of Mettur said that she was married to Chinnannan for 14 years and after his death in 2008 she got remarried to a man of Paramathi Velur. However, soon after the marriage, she got separated from him. Later, she joined as section writer at the tahsildar office in Mettur. She said that she lived with the then election deputy Tahsildar for three years. She alleged that was beaten her and sexually harassed. When contacted, he told the media that she had lodged false complaint against him many a times and he had told the truth to the police during earlier investigation.

Arrested

In another incident in Namakkal, The police on Sunday arrested a 42-year-old worker on charges of sexual assault of a Standard VI student in Rasipuram.

S. Baskar of Erode was married and has two children. On Sunday, he went to meet his friend where he lured the girl. He committed sexual assault on the girl. Neighbours caught him and handed over to the Rasipuram police. A medical examination was done on the girl at District Government Headquarters Hospital in Namakkal.
title: Woman alleges sexual harassment
